body:
Comment 5: 
There's a definite boundary on this machine:

$ go install -p 6 ./...
real    0m4.879s
user    0m21.857s
sys     0m4.111s

$ go install -p 7 ./...
real    0m23.245s
user    0m22.779s
sys     2m9.553s

and it can get quite a lot worse:

$ go install -p 10 ./...
real    0m47.577s
user    0m20.583s
sys     4m59.195s
